document.full_text: a bomb blew up a u.n. vehicle near the southern lebanese port city of sidon on friday, killing an italian united nations peacekeeper, security sources said.
document.title: italian u.n. soldier dies in lebanon attack
lines_and_colors: a bomb blew up a u.n. vehicle near the southern lebanese port city of sidon on friday, killing an italian united nations peacekeeper, security sources said.
